ygData.subject: USWest will die.
ygData.msgSnippet: USWest (now named Qwest, but with the same bad service) is down again, so I won t be able to post regularly till tomorrow. They said that they ll fix it by

USWest (now named Qwest, but with the same bad service) is down again, so I 
won't be able to post regularly till tomorrow. They said that they'll fix it 
by 8pm, but last time they said that it took them a week.

So c ya all when Qwest fixes itself. I'll resume regular posting then. Right 
now I have to post from school.




DEATH TO QWEST.
